title: Kunal Kamra: Why an Indian comedian is challenging fake news rules
selftext: Not the hero we needed but the hero we deserve.
comments: I genuinely laughed when he first filed the case. What an amazing guy.

I remember back in 2017 when aatma nirbhar people were against him.

Modi bhakts ke ghar wapsi ho rhe hai.
